column78: Located in the picturesque city center of Oud-Rekem; you can find this phenomenal mansion dating back to 1850. With its monumental facade and beautiful authentic front door; the house immediately catches the eye. The house has been thoroughly updated to contemporary values and standards which today creates a beautiful family home with beautiful staircase; open modern kitchen; dining room and living room with gas fireplace. All this opening onto the south facing garden and large terrace. Also on the ground floor is a large office currently used as a TV room. The house has several bedrooms all with large windows overlooking the village at the front and the garden at the back. There is a central separate bathroom on both floors.In additionto a spacious back utility room/storage room; the spacious wine cellar and separate laundry room; among other things; the home also has a fully furnished room that could serve perfectly as a hobby room or even be converted into a separate studio. The attic space is accessed via a fixed staircase and immediately notice the beautiful wooden roof truss; this too could easily be converted into a large bedroom or hobby room. The garage provides space for two cars and has an accessible attic storage room. The driveway itself is privatized by a gate.On the spacious terrace you can enjoy the sun with complete privacy. The garden is a true oasis of green and gives access through a locked gate via the idyllic little bridge to your own pri

column56: This beautiful; well-established restaurant; which has been in operation since 1972; is situated on approximately 2 hectares of land adjacent to a stunning nature reserve in Tessenderlo. The farmhouse is completely surrounded by meadows and greenery; with many walking and cycling routes passing by the restaurant. The restaurant has three versatile rooms; each available separately. It can accommodate a total of 302 guests; inside and outside combined. The property itself was stylishly renovated in 2012 and includes an extensive kitchen; living room; office space; three bedrooms; dressing room; and two bathrooms. The property offers many possibilities; including the option to convert it into a private residence or B&B. Features: - Possibility of B&B - Fully renovated in 2012 - Ready for immediate use as a restaurant; with all necessary equipment included - Beautiful; peaceful environment with many tourist attractions.

Deze authentieke te renoveren brouwerij uit 1878 te Kerkom-bij-Sint-Truiden ligt op een unieke locatie langs de wandel- en fietsroutes in Haspengouw. Ook het centrum van Sint-Truiden is niet ver. De vierkantshoeve bestaat uit goed draaidende horecazaak met feestzaal; brouwerij de Bink dewelke terug opgestart zal worden tegen het einde van 2023 en een woongedeelte. Recent is er een nieuwe opslagruimte bijgebouwd en zijn de daken vernieuwd; enkel het plat dak is niet voldoende geïsoleerd. Ook is het oorspronkelijk cafeetje nog aanwezig maar dit heeft een degelijke opfrisbeurt nodig. Verder beschikt deze brouwerij over verschillende ruimtes om vergaderzalen te maken; een overdekt terras; een horecakeuken en een binnenkoer dewelke je kan bereiken via de grote toegangspoort aan de rechterzijde. Ook is het pand geschikt om een B&B te maken. In het woonhuis bevinden zich op het gelijkvloers een keuken; ruime woonkamer; een eetkamer en een gastentoilet. Boven heeft men 5 slaapkamers en een badkamer. Deze hoeve staat op een perceel van ca. 1 Ha. en biedt tal van mogelijkheden! Mits grondige renovatiewerken kan je deze vierkantshoeve omtoveren tot een pareltje.

Sorry; there is no English translation. Uitzonderlijk vastgoed te koop! Recent volledig gerenoveerde molen met woonst en handelsgedeelte. BESCHRIJVING: De Molen van Rotem is een watermolen op de Velpe; een zijrivier van de Demer. De molen is ideaal gelegen: vlakbij het museum van de Slag der Zilveren Helmen; rustig in het groen. Dit is de ideale stopplaats voor de talloze fietsers en wandelaars. De Molen werd in 2005 beschermd als monument samen met de onmiddellijke omgeving. In 2016 werd de Rotemse molen volledig gerenoveerd. Deze unieke eigendom verspreidt zich over meerdere percelen met in totaal een oppervlakte van 3ha 58a 23ca. Door de ligging aan de Velpe kan u in uw eigen tuin heerlijk genieten van een kronkelende waterloop met een diversiteit aan fauna en flora; klinkt dat niet zalig? De rustige en groene omgeving zijn echt een grote troef voor de ligging van het pand. Het woongedeelte heeft een klassieke maar luxueuze uitstraling en is direct bewoonbaar. Verder is er mogelijkheid voor bijvoorbeeld een horecazaak. Indeling: Gelijkvloers: Eetkamer; inkomhal met trap; zithoek (mogelijk slaapkamer); keuken in landelijke stijl; woonkamer; traphal; polyvalente ruimte voor bijvoorbeeld horeca met aansluitend het ruime terras; toiletruimte; molen; Verdieping: Slaapkamer 1; Slaapkamer 2; badkamer met bad; douche; lavabo en toilet; Torenkamer: eventueel extra slaapkamer. Belangrijke weetjes: Geen renovatieverplichting - EPC label D / Geen asbestmaterialen aanwezig

column56: This property is located in Diepenbeek; which is centrally located between the cities of Hasselt; Genk; Bilzen and Kortessem and is easily accessible via the E313. The property includes a house; 2 apartments; an indoor and outdoor arena; a covered arena (tent); 60 horse stables; a lunging circle; a horse walker and fenced meadows. The apartment is located on the second floor and includes a spacious living room with kitchen; 2 bedrooms; a dressing room and a bathroom. On the ground floor there is an entrance hall. The apartments are divided between the lower and upper floors. Downstairs there is a first apartment with 5 bedrooms; a bathroom and a common living room/kitchen. On the second floor is a 2nd apartment with a bedroom and abathroom. These are ideally equipped for hosting guests or as grooms quarters. The horse accommodation consists of 2 drained outdoor arenas of 20m x 60m and 50m x 80m. The indoor arena with adjoining canteen measures 20m x 40m. There is also a second covered arena (tent) measuring 25m x 45m. There are 60 horse stables with various washing areas on the premises; which are located around the indoor arena. This professional accommodation is ideally equipped for organizing equestrian events in all disciplines.

The night hall overlooks the underlying dining area. Basement: The house is partially basemented and equipped with; among other things; a fitness room; music room; .. Garden: Completely fenced south-west facing garden with electric entrance gate. Swimming pool with pool house; sauna; and paved play area. column76: This qualitative farmhouse is very peacefully located in a unique spot in Heusden-Zolder on a plot of approximately 1 hectare. It includes; among other things; 8 horse stables; an outdoor arena; a tack room; and storage spaces. The house is very spacious; allowing for multiple bedrooms. The house includes: - A large office space - An entrance hall with a separate toilet - A kitchen with a kitchen island and a dining area - A large living room - Two spacious bedrooms; one with a dressing room (multiple bedrooms possible) - A bathroom with a bathtub - A bathroom with a shower - A toilet - A laundry room - A double garage - A cellar - An attic The property includes: - A cozy terrace - A grooming salon - A beautiful tack room - A laundry room - 8 horse stables - A separate toilet - A carport - Ample storage space - 5 fenced paddocks - An outdoor arena (25m x 50m) with lighting You can step right into the most blissful and unspoiled nature. The forests of Terlaemen and the Kluis; the breathtaking Wijers; and the beautiful Bovy estate provide peace and relaxation close to home. Ideal for hours of exploration with your horse. The local elementary school; the scouts; tennis; soccer; the sports hall; and more are all within a 2-kilometer radius of your home. The E314 is just two minutes away; and the E313 is also easily accessible. Hasselt is only a 15-minute drive. Interested? Contact Carina at carina@immofluisteraar.be or 0479 75 82 58.

column60: 115 kWh/m² kilowatt hour per square meters
column76: Lovers of calm and nature; a bucolic meeting awaits you at the turn. Nestled in a domain of +/- 5;68 hectares; these stables (to be renovated) will not leave you indifferent... Its location is more than ideal as you will enjoy a magical and authentic setting while being close to the motorways (E314 and E313). Enjoy a house of +/- 300 m2 of character (facade listed in the heritage register). This house needs to be completely renovated inside to exploit its full potential! Access to the first stable divided into 2 corridors with 20 boxes. The second stable will not fail to seduce you as it is an old mill and its watercourse still in use today. Its facade is also listed in the heritage register. Inside; there are 8 boxes; a large tack room and a grooming room. At the rear of the former mill there are 6 outdoor boxes. Following the path; a magnificent and large cafeteria with its wooden bar will be there to welcome you and your customers to enjoy the superb views of the large outdoor arena and the indoor arena! Passing along the track and the cafeteria; your horses will enjoy the pleasant meadows! As well as a former galloping oval which can be redeveloped as such or simply used as a meadow of +/- 2.24 hectares. - Manure and operating permits in order - Partially re-roofed. More info on our website ;)

column52: Een exclusieve villa in het Zoute; omgeven door weelderig groen en gelegen aan een rustige doodlopende straat in de nabijheid van de Kalfsmolen en de Graaf Jansdijk. De indeling van het huis omvat een inkomhal met vestiaire en gastentoilet; een riante woon- en eetkamer met directe toegang tot de ideaal gelegen tuin met zwembad. De volledig uitgeruste keuken met moderne apparatuur beschikt tevens over een gezellige ontbijthoek. Een praktische wasruimte/berging is eveneens aangehecht. Op de bovenverdieping bevindt zich de master bedroom met aangrenzende badkamer; voorzien van een ligbad; douche; wastafel en toilet. Daarnaast zijn er drie volwaardige slaapkamers; elk met een eigen privé douchekamer. Op de tweede verdieping zijn er twee ruime slaapkamers met een gedeelde douchekamer. Een inpandige garage en meerdere parkeerplaatsen zijn beschikbaar; evenals een zwembad. Momenteel ondergaat de villa renovatiewerken. Uw toekomstige villa? Om een bezoek in te plannen kan u ons altijd contacteren op verkoop@hetzoute.be of 050 60 33 33.

column77: Domain of approximately 12 hectares with an English country house (built in 1955 with renovation in 2004); a tennis court; caretaker's house and various outbuildings. It is located in a nature reserve with trees and open spaces. This house comprises on the ground floor a stately entrance hall; cozy living room with fireplace; dining room with patio doors to the terrace with views over the domain; a kitchen with utility room; a study; family room and a library. The first floor includes a spacious night hall; the master suite with a ladies' and gents' dressing room; an attractive bedroom with a fireplace and a fitted bathroom. The second and third bedrooms share the bathroom and the fourth bedroom has an en-suite bathroom. The second floor contains various areas; including the laundry room and department for resident staff. The spacious basement includes a wine cellar; storage cellars and the technical room. Other: The country house is equipped with high-quality parquet floors; natural stone and joinery. Here you will find absolute privacy; yet it is residential and conveniently located in relation to the center; schools; restaurants and with good accessibility. For more information please contact Matthias Vertommen +32 (0) 470 818 722.

Enjoying a view on the Royal Antwerp Golfcourse; prestigious modern villa of ± 1.130 m² of luxurious living space on a plot of ± 9.312 m². With its South-West oriented terraces and an outdoor swimming pool with a poolhouse overlooking the stylish garden; this villa separates business from privacy. It presents an entrance hall with an office; meeting room and an entrance to the private area where you'll find the living room with fireplace on parquet; a dining room with view on the Koi-pont; a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast corner; television room; garage for 4 cars and a side-entrance to the terrace with shower; laundry room and pantry. The first floor consists of a master suite with fireplace; terrace; dressing and marble bathroom; 2 suites with shared dressing and marble bathroom; guest room with bathroom; separate studio and fitness area with sauna and hammam. The basement; offers a modern wine cellar; a home cinema and spacious relax area with fireplace. Other: this villa is finished; indoors and outdoors; with outstanding quality and filled with technical details. Exceptional low EPC of 61 Kwh. Sale under registration fee. The property is located in the forest of Kapellen; magnificent for walking; biking and horse-riding. Shops and schools are within a 5 minutes drive and public highway at approximately 15 minutes away. For more information please contact Nathalie Van Gastel on +32 499 60 20 82.

column53: Stylish living in a renovated classic eighteenth-century castle. Are you looking for a lot of space; a beautiful incidence of light and large stately rooms where it is pleasant to linger; but which at the same time can serve as an exhibition area; conference room or for offices? Then perhaps the long; prestigious driveway of Kasteel Zoerselhof will lead you through the beautifully laid out and meticulously maintained French front garden to the property of your dreams. Here you will enjoy a spacious living area of approximately 1;000 m²; fully renovated with a high and modern standard of finish. On the ground floor; you enter through the entrance hall with authentic monumental staircase and large fireplace. You will find large and light rooms that are currently used as a meeting room; conference room; office; semi-industrial kitchen and cloakroom. On the first floor are the cosy living spaces: large kitchen; lounge with fireplace; dining room; master bedroom with bathroom and dressing room; 3 bedrooms and bathroom. All with beautiful open views over the beautifully landscaped private estate of 15 ha. On the second floor there is an exhibition room; the billiard room; the guest room with bathroom and 4 office rooms. The third floor is a playroom with built-in cupboards. This property is also impressive in terms of its outdoor spaces. In addition to the French front garden already mentioned; there is a cosy English park garden at the back with lots of privacy and gre

column53: Beautiful classicist castle on the edge of the Zoersel forest with great potential as a castle house or office space. Large rooms on the ground floor; a fully fitted kitchen and living space on the first floor; bedrooms and bathrooms on several floors. Surrounding gardens; tennis courts; outbuilding with garages and guest room; and works of art make this castle an ideal green base.

column53: Located in a quiet and green area; classistic castle from the 18th century with living surface of ± 900 m² in the ± 15 ha domain of the 'Zoerselbos'. The entrance; with its long driveway and French garden; leads to the castle. The castle was completely renovated with a high modern finish. The entrance hall; with authentic stairs and large fireplace leads to various large living spaces which are currently used as a meeting room; large reception; office; kitchen and cloakroom. The first floor includes a living room with fireplace; dining room and fully equipped kitchen. Furthermore this floor offers a master bedroom with bathroom and dressing; 3 bedrooms and a bathroom. On the second floor; a billiard room/polyvalent room; guest room; bathroom; 4 office spaces that can be used as bedrooms and a large exhibition space. The attic is furnished with fitted closets and a lot of storage space. Next to the castle is a coach house with a multipurpose room on the ground floor and an apartment on the first floor that can be used as guesthouse. Other: elevator; tennis court with clubhouse; separate parking for visitors; ideal combination for work and private life. In a quiet; green environment with easy access to Antwerp and the Netherlands. For more information; please contact us on +32 (0) 2 898 09 40.

column84: This unique castle villa is located on a private estate of 2.7 hectares and offers a range of impressive features. The long driveway across the estate leads to the imposing courtyard where the feeling of grandeur and history set the tone. The fusion of Périgord architecture with all modern conveniences on the lush estate ensures that history; luxury; and privacy are combined in a harmonious way; truly making this villa one of a kind. In the adjoining wing of the main building; there is a fully-fledged guesthouse; which can serve as additional accommodation or also as a caretaker's residence. Be sure to check out our website www.hillewaere.be for more information and a 3D tour!

column84: The Lozerhof; this high-end equestrian accommodation with numerous possibilities on approximately 6 hectares; is located in an East Flemish municipality known for its rural and peaceful surroundings; yet easily accessible. There is no shortage of lifestyle due to the proximity of several culinary restaurants; historical cities; and equestrian events. The beautiful driveway provides access to both the mansion and the equestrian accommodation. The first impression is breathtaking due to the high-quality finish of both the building and the greenery. First; we will take you through the numerous horse facilities: The spacious barn can accommodate up to 41 horses. The cozy; fully equipped bar with a view of the spacious outdoor arena (50m x 70m – ebb and flow) and indoor arena (22m x 40m) with automatic irrigation; provides direct access to the tack room; solarium; and wash areas. To complete the facilities; you will also find an office; a spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms and a beautiful view; a studio; and ample storage for hay; straw; and machinery. The apartment and the studio have views of the outdoor arena; indoor arena; and stables; providing a pleasant living environment and better supervision of the horses. The outdoor area of this equestrian domain features the extremely high-quality ebb and flow outdoor arena measuring 70m by 50m; surrounded by fenced pastures. A feeling of peace; spaciousness; and beautiful views provide a unique riding experience. Warming up and

Mooi project waarbij totaalbeleving in het GROEN centraal staat. VERGUNNING aanwezig voor 128 woongelegenheden (waarvan 11 EW); 2.440 m² retail; 130 ondergrondse parkings; 20 bovengrondse bezoekersparkings. Meer info: sophie@immobeguin.be

Located in a rural area; architectural villa (built in 2015) by design agency Dries De Malsche with a net habitable surface of ± 362 m² with beautifully landscaped garden and pool house on a unique plot of ± 6585 m². The villa comprises a spacious entrance; living kitchen with island equipped with Miele; Gaggenau and Sub-zero appliances; living room with a view over the garden and finished with Marbau parquet floor; Metalfire fireplace and bookcase. The first floor includes three spacious bedrooms with shared bathroom and on the top floor a master suite with ensuite bathroom and dressing room; also a sitting area that can be used as a fifth bedroom. The house has a double garage; spacious wine cellar and atmospheric poolhouse with sauna; walk-in shower and pleasant sitting area with a view of the garden and forest. Other: Landscaped garden by Group Moris with swimming pond. Very high-quality materials used such as: Muschel limestone; Onyx marble; Cea design taps; Afrormosia wood; Duotechno home automation system. Geothermal energy has also been used; supplemented with solar panels for hot water and underfloor heating via geothermal energy. Outbuilding at the back of the plot for garden equipment. For more information; please contact Matthias Vertommen on +32 470 818 722.

This generous estate with outbuildings is located in the quiet green outskirts of Waasmunster and therefore enjoys an excellent location in the Antwerp-Ghent-Brussels triangle. Ideal for companies; offices; a commercial operation or a combination of majestic living and work. The castle dates from 1814 and is built in neoclassical style with pronounced influences from the empire style and palladianism. It is surrounded by a vast landscape park with an undulating relief that alternates between winding paths; flowery water features; rolling lawns and a diversity of tree groups and woodlands. You enter the castle through the central rectangular entrance hall. Large windows and high ceilings immediately highlight the enormous sense of space. That spatial effect is enhanced in the rotunda behind the entrance. The room extends to the roof; with a skylight painted in trompe l'oeil as a phenomenal organ point. Because of its unusual acoustics; this was presumably the former music room; which also housed an orchestra stand. The rotunda with dome is just one of the many different authentic elements that give the castle its nostalgic charm. Original elements such as the marble fireplaces; characteristic parquet floors and wooden doors catapult you back in time two centuries. Besides the entrance and rotunda; the ground floor also includes the office; lounge; dining room and kitchen. On the second floor there are 6 bedrooms (4 of which are en-suite) and 2 bathrooms. column69: 139 kWh/m² kilowatt hour per square meters

column57: Discover the magic of Runenborg Castle; a unique and well-maintained property with authentic charm. Runenborg Castle is located in green Heusden; a stone's throw from Ghent; near schools; shops and public transport and with easy access to all connecting roads (E17; E40; R4;...). The castle offers a peaceful view of an attractive natural water feature and is surrounded by a beautiful park landscape of approximately 8 hectares. Given its spacious floor space and numerous rooms; it offers endless potential. On the ground floor; you enter the château through the central entrance hall that gives access to the cosy lounge on the one hand and to the spacious dining room and kitchen with pantry on the other. On the first floor; there are 6 bedrooms; 2 bathrooms and two more extra rooms (dressing room; storage room). A third bathroom can be found on the mezzanine. The second floor houses 7 bedrooms; an ironing room and an extra lounge. There is also a large attic that can be converted if desired. The building has a full basement. This semi-underground cellar enjoys natural light and contains a laundry room; an air-conditioned wine cellar; the garage and various work areas. Convenient is the presence of a lift that takes you from -1 to +2. Runenborg Castle offers the space and atmosphere to turn your ideas into reality and build on a unique piece of history in the spacious surroundings of Ghent.
